body: Hi am i the only one that suffers bad lag in the hub and glitches with the compass, if not could you guys look into this and maybe help resolve the problem thanks.
body_tagged: Hi am i the only one that suffers bad lag in the hub and glitches with the compass, if not could you guys look into this and maybe help resolve the problem thanks.
title: The Server (lobby)

replies.body: I lag on the hub a lot. A few things you can do is change your rendering settings. For example maybe try shortening the render distance. It seems like a lot of people lag in the hub. Hope this helps! :)
replies.body_tagged: I lag on the hub a lot. A few things you can do is change your rendering settings. For example maybe try shortening the render distance. It seems like a lot of people lag in the hub. Hope this helps! :)
